name: SOFT8025
description: College Assignment for Scalable Microservices using code template provided by lecturer

scripts.start: concurrently --kill-others "cd cart && node app.js" "cd catalogue && node app.js" "cd front-end && node server.js" "cd users && node app.js"
scripts.update: cd cart && npm i && cd ../catalogue && npm i && cd ../front-end && npm i && cd ../users && npm i
